parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Failure - Spongy or Mushy Brake Pedal
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the vehicle to lose stopping power, leading to accidents or near-miss situations, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels spongy or mushy
the brakes fail to engage properly
the vehicle shakes or vibrates when braking
the ABS warning light is illuminated on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Cracked brake rotors can cause the vehicle to vibrate or shake when braking, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle shakes or vibrates when braking
the brake pedal pulsates or feels uneven
the brake rotors are cracked or damaged.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake System Failure - Locking or Smoking Brakes
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the brake system can cause the brakes to lock or smoke, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The brakes lock or stick
the brakes produce smoke when engaged
the ABS warning light is illuminated on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The separation of the windshield from its mounting can cause a significant safety hazard, as it can lead to reduced visibility, wind noise, and potentially even ejection of the windshield while driving, which can result in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: Whistling noise around the windshield area
windshield coming out of mounting
windshield separating from gasket at the top right corner
leaving a 2" opening between the window and windshield
windshield popping out while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The overheating of brake calipers can cause brake failure, leading to accidents or loss of control of the vehicle.
symptoms: Brake loss
melted brake caliper
overheated brake caliper.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the dashboard display can cause the driver to lose critical information, such as speed, gear, and oil pressure, which can lead to accidents or unsafe driving conditions.
symptoms: The LCD display in the dash goes blank
inability to see speed
gear
oil pressure
and other important information.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The unintended activation and lockup of the brakes can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering wheel turns hard to one side
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle pulls to one side
the brakes lock up
the vehicle slows down or stops unexpectedly
smoke and heat emanate from the wheel area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The obstruction of the instrument panel can cause the driver to be distracted or unable to monitor vital vehicle information, increasing the risk of accidents or near-misses.
symptoms: The steering wheel blocks the view of the instrument panel
making it difficult to see the speedometer
gauges
and warning lights.
